full_story:
One sunny day in Bedrock, Fred was so excited about bowling that he made a silly bet with Arnold the paperboy. “I bet you my favorite armchair that I can strike three times in a row!” he boomed, his loud voice echoing through the neighborhood. Wilma, sitting in the kitchen, raised an eyebrow. “Fred, maybe you should think twice before you gamble!” she said calmly, but Fred just laughed. “I’m the best bowler in town!” Fred's best friend Barney cheered, “Go, Fred, go!” Pebbles clapped her little hands, giggling, “Daddy, you can do it!” Dino wagged his tail, bouncing excitedly. Fred bowled his heart out, but oh no! He only knocked down two pins! Arnold grinned, “Looks like I win, Fred! Your armchair and your TV are mine now!” Fred's face fell, and he sighed, “Oh no, what have I done?” 

When he got home, Wilma hugged him tight. “It’s okay, Fred. We’ll find a way to get our things back.” Betty smiled and said, “Let’s have a yard sale! We can sell things we don’t need and get your furniture back!” Barney nodded eagerly, “I’ll help!” The next day, everyone worked together. Pebbles sold lemonade, Dino chased butterflies, and Wilma and Betty organized the sale. Fred felt better seeing everyone smile as they sold old toys and clothes. At the end of the day, they had enough money to get back Fred's armchair and TV! Fred hugged Wilma and said, “I learned my lesson! No more gambling!” Wilma smiled, “That’s right, Fred. Family and friends are what truly matter!” With Dino barking happily, they all sat together, watching their favorite show on the TV, feeling grateful for each other and their cozy home.

global_characters_dict.Dino: Dino is a medium-sized, cartoon dinosaur with a long neck and a friendly look. He has a round, plump body with a long, flexible tail and short limbs. His head is large and elongated with a wide mouth and rounded snout. Dino’s neck is very long and slender. His skin is smooth and bright pink with several dark spots on his back. He has small, round eyes set close together, expressive eyebrows, and two small nostrils near the end of his snout. He also has a pair of small, rounded ears on top of his head and a few thin, black hair strands. His toes and fingers are rounded, and his overall posture is upright and cheerful. Dino is a pink dinosaur with black spots on his back and tail. He wears a light blue collar with a yellow tag. His overall look is playful and cartoonish, matching a pet-like character in a prehistoric setting.
global_characters_dict.Betty: Betty is a young woman with a petite frame and soft facial features. She has a slender body with a small waist and long legs. She has a small, oval face with a rounded chin. Her skin is fair and smooth. Betty’s hair is jet black, short, and styled in a neat bob with a slight wave, topped with a small bow. Her eyebrows are thin and arched, and her eyelashes are short. She has large, expressive eyes and a small nose. Her lips are full and usually smiling. Her ears are small and set close to her head. Her fingers are slender, and her overall appearance is gentle and approachable. Betty is wearing a light blue, sleeveless dress with a jagged hem, made from a simple, stone-age style fabric. She has a black necklace with a white pendant and a blue bow in her hair. She is barefoot, and her style is casual and primitive.
global_characters_dict.Barney: Barney is a short, stout man with a compact, rounded body. He has no beard or mustache. He has a proportionally large head on a short, thick neck and broad shoulders. His limbs are short and thick, particularly his legs, giving him a sturdy appearance. His posture is relaxed with slightly sloped shoulders. He has fair, smooth skin. Barney’s face is rounded with a prominent, bulbous nose and a small chin. He has small, round eyes and thick, short eyebrows. His blonde hair is neatly cut and styled flat against his head. His ears are small and close to the head. He has a wide smile, showcasing evenly spaced teeth. Barney is wearing a sleeveless, brown tunic that is short and rough-edged, tied at the neck with a simple string. The fabric looks coarse and primitive. He is barefoot, and his outfit has a casual, stone-age style.
global_characters_dict.Fred: Fred is a middle-aged man with a large and broad body. He has no beard or mustache. He has a strong, stocky body with broad shoulders and short, thick legs. His head is large in proportion to his body, with a wide jaw and a pronounced chin. He has a round face and a short neck. His skin is light and smooth. His hair is black, thick, and styled with a simple side part. His eyebrows are bold and slightly arched. He has a wide mouth with visible front teeth and a big smile. His ears are medium-sized and stick out slightly. His nose is large and rounded, and his eyes are oval-shaped with small pupils. Fred is wearing a sleeveless, knee-length orange tunic with black spots, made of a rough, stone-age style fabric. He has a blue necktie and is barefoot. His overall style is casual and primitive, matching a prehistoric theme.
global_characters_dict.Wilma: Wilma is a slender woman with a graceful and elegant appearance. She has a slender body with long arms and legs, and her proportions are tall and elegant. Her shoulders are narrow, and her neck is long and thin. She has a small, oval-shaped face and a pointed chin. Her skin is fair and smooth. Her hair is bright orange, thick, and styled in a high bun with a distinct curl at the front. Her eyebrows are thin and curved, and her eyelashes are short. She has small, round eyes and a small nose. Her lips are red and well-defined. Her ears are small and close to her head. Her fingers are long and slim, and she is always in a graceful, upright posture. Wilma is wearing a one-shoulder, white dress with a jagged hem, made from a simple, stone-age style fabric. She has a chunky white necklace and is barefoot. Her overall look is minimalist and primitive, fitting a prehistoric theme.
global_characters_dict.Pebbles: Pebbles is a small toddler girl with a round face and a playful expression. She has a chubby, short body with a large head compared to her body, short arms and legs, and a visible baby belly. Her posture is relaxed and playful. Pebbles has fair, smooth skin. Her hair is bright orange, thick, and tied up in a high ponytail with a large white bow. She has fine, short eyebrows and long eyelashes. Her eyes are big and round, and her cheeks are full. She has a small, upturned nose and a wide smile, showing her small teeth. Her ears are small and close to her head.  Pebbles is wearing a sleeveless, bright green top with black spots and blue shorts. She has her orange hair tied up with a large white bone-shaped hair accessory. Her style is cute and playful, fitting for a young child in a stone-age setting. She is barefoot.

Pebbles is standing behind the lemonade stand pouring lemonade into a cup with a big smile while Dino is playfully leaping and running after the butterflies his tail wagging with excitement. Pebbles has a bright cheerful expression filled with joy and enthusiasm as she engages with her customers. Dino shows a playful and curious demeanor his eyes wide with excitement as he chases the butterflies. Pebbles is positioned in the foreground slightly to the left behind her lemonade stand while Dino is in the center mid-chase with butterflies flitting around him. The scene is set in a sunny park with green grass trees in the background and a clear blue sky. The atmosphere is lively with other children playing and enjoying the day. Medium shot capturing both Pebbles at her lemonade stand and Dino in action showcasing the vibrant colors of the lemonade stand and the butterflies.

captions_info.caption: Wilma and Betty organized the sale, and Fred felt happy seeing everyone work together.
captions_info.description: Wilma. Wilma is a slender woman with a graceful and elegant appearance. She has a slender body with long arms and legs, and her proportions are tall and elegant. Her shoulders are narrow, and her neck is long and thin. She has a small, oval-shaped face and a pointed chin. Her skin is fair and smooth. Her hair is bright orange, thick, and styled in a high bun with a distinct curl at the front. Her eyebrows are thin and curved, and her eyelashes are short. She has small, round eyes and a small nose. Her lips are red and well-defined. Her ears are small and close to her head. Her fingers are long and slim, and she is always in a graceful, upright posture. Wilma is wearing a one-shoulder, white dress with a jagged hem, made from a simple, stone-age style fabric. She has a chunky white necklace and is barefoot. Her overall look is minimalist and primitive, fitting a prehistoric theme. Betty. Betty is a young woman with a petite frame and soft facial features. She has a slender body with a small waist and long legs. She has a small, oval face with a rounded chin. Her skin is fair and smooth. Betty’s hair is jet black, short, and styled in a neat bob with a slight wave, topped with a small bow. Her eyebrows are thin and arched, and her eyelashes are short. She has large, expressive eyes and a small nose. Her lips are full and usually smiling. Her ears are small and set close to her head. Her fingers are slender, and her overall appearance is gentle and approachable. Betty is wearing a light blue, sleeveless dress with a jagged hem, made from a simple, stone-age style fabric. She has a black necklace with a white pendant and a blue bow in her hair. She is barefoot, and her style is casual and primitive. Fred. Fred is a middle-aged man with a large and broad body. He has no beard or mustache. He has a strong, stocky body with broad shoulders and short, thick legs. His head is large in proportion to his body, with a wide jaw and a pronounced chin. He has a round face and a short neck. His skin is light and smooth. His hair is black, thick, and styled with a simple side part. His eyebrows are bold and slightly arched. He has a wide mouth with visible front teeth and a big smile. His ears are medium-sized and stick out slightly. His nose is large and rounded, and his eyes are oval-shaped with small pupils. Fred is wearing a sleeveless, knee-length orange tunic with black spots, made of a rough, stone-age style fabric. He has a blue necktie and is barefoot. His overall style is casual and primitive, matching a prehistoric theme.A cheerful outdoor scene depicting a community sale organized by Wilma and Betty with Fred observing the teamwork and feeling happy about the event. A variety of items for sale are displayed on tables including handmade crafts baked goods and colorful decorations creating a lively marketplace atmosphere. Wilma and Betty are actively arranging the items on the tables chatting with each other and smiling while Fred stands nearby watching them with a pleased expression. Wilma and Betty are both smiling brightly showing enthusiasm and satisfaction in their work. Fred has a warm smile on his face radiating happiness and appreciation for the teamwork. Wilma is on the left side of the image bending slightly to adjust an item on the table. Betty is on the right side standing upright with her hands on her hips looking at Wilma. Fred is positioned in the center slightly behind the tables observing the scene. The background features a sunny park setting with trees and a clear blue sky. Other community members can be seen in the distance engaging in conversations and browsing the sale items adding to the lively atmosphere. Wide shot capturing the entire scene of the sale including Wilma and Betty at the tables and Fred in the foreground allowing viewers to see the bustling activity and the variety of items for sale.

Fred is standing proudly next to his armchair with a big grin on his face while his friends are gathered around him sharing in the joy of the moment.
